nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议德宏傣族景颇族自治州委员会

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议德宏傣族景颇族自治州委员会

location.zh-cn: 德宏傣族景颇族自治州芒市斑色路3号
location.en: No. 3 Banse Road, Mangshi, Dehong Dai and Jingpo Autonomous Prefecture

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国云南省德宏傣族景颇族自治州的政治协商会议组织。
description.en: The political consultative conference organization of Dehong Dai and Jingpo Autonomous Prefecture, Yunnan Province, People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议云南省委员会

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议云南省委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议在云南省的省级地方委员会。
description.en: The provincial committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference in Yunnan Province.

nodes.id: 中国共产党德宏傣族景颇族自治州委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党德宏傣族景颇族自治州委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在德宏傣族景颇族自治州的地方组织。
description.en: The local organization of the Chinese Communist Party in Dehong Dai and Jingpo Autonomous Prefecture.

nodes.id: 德宏傣族景颇族自治区首届各族各界人民代表协商委员会

zh-cn: 德宏傣族景颇族自治区首届各族各界人民代表协商委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议德宏傣族景颇族自治州委员会的前身机构。
description.en: The predecessor organization of the CPPCC Dehong Dai and Jingpo Autonomous Prefecture Committee.

description.zh-cn: 云南省德宏傣族景颇族自治州下辖的县级市，是该州州府所在地。
description.en: A county-level city under the jurisdiction of Dehong Dai and Jingpo Autonomous Prefecture, Yunnan Province, and the seat of the prefecture's government.

nodes.id: 保山专区各族各界人民代表会议协商委员会

zh-cn: 保山专区各族各界人民代表会议协商委员会

description.zh-cn: 1951年在保山专区成立的政治协商机构。
description.en: A political consultative body established in Baoshan Prefecture in 1951.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国中央人民政府 (1949年—1954年)

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国中央人民政府 (1949年—1954年)
en: Central People's Government of the People's Republic of China (1949–1954)

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国在1949年至1954年间的中央政府。
description.en: The central government of the People's Republic of China from 1949 to 1954.

description.zh-cn: 1950年由中央人民政府派往西南边疆地区进行慰问的代表团。
description.en: A delegation sent by the Central People's Government in 1950 to visit the southwestern border regions.

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议共同纲领

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议共同纲领

description.zh-cn: 在1954年《中华人民共和国宪法》颁布前，实际上起着临时宪法的作用。
description.en: It effectively served as the interim constitution of the People's Republic of China before the promulgation of the 1954 Constitution.

description.zh-cn: 曾任保山专区各族各界人民代表会议协商委员会主席。
description.en: Served as the chairman of the Consultative Committee of the People's Representative Conference of all Ethnic Groups and Circles in Baoshan Prefecture.

description.zh-cn: 白族，曾任保山专区各族各界人民代表会议协商委员会副主席。
description.en: Of Bai ethnicity, served as a vice-chairman of the Consultative Committee of the People's Representative Conference of all Ethnic Groups and Circles in Baoshan Prefecture.

description.zh-cn: 傣族，曾任保山专区各族各界人民代表会议协商委员会副主席。
description.en: Of Dai ethnicity, served as a vice-chairman of the Consultative Committee of the People's Representative Conference of all Ethnic Groups and Circles in Baoshan Prefecture.

description.zh-cn: 傣族，曾任保山专区各族各界人民代表会议协商委员会副主席。
description.en: Of Dai ethnicity, served as a vice-chairman of the Consultative Committee of the People's Representative Conference of all Ethnic Groups and Circles in Baoshan Prefecture.

description.zh-cn: 景颇族，曾任保山专区各族各界人民代表会议协商委员会副主席。
description.en: Of Jingpo ethnicity, served as a vice-chairman of the Consultative Committee of the People's Representative Conference of all Ethnic Groups and Circles in Baoshan Prefecture.

description.zh-cn: 由毛泽东发动和领导的政治运动，对中国社会造成了广泛而深远的影响。
description.en: A political movement initiated and led by Mao Zedong, which had a wide-ranging and profound impact on Chinese society.

relationships.source: 中国人民政治协商会议德宏傣族景颇族自治州委员会
relationships.target: 中国人民政治协商会议云南省委员会

description.zh-cn: 根据信息框内容，德宏州政协的上级机构是中国人民政治协商会议云南省委员会。
description.en: According to the infobox, the superior body of the CPPCC Dehong Committee is the CPPCC Yunnan Provincial Committee.

relationships.source: 中国人民政治协商会议德宏傣族景颇族自治州委员会
relationships.target: 中国共产党德宏傣族景颇族自治州委员会

description.zh-cn: 根据信息框内容，德宏州政协的中共上级是中国共产党德宏傣族景颇族自治州委员会，接受其政治领导。
description.en: According to the infobox, the superior CCP organization of the CPPCC Dehong Committee is the CCP Dehong Prefectural Committee, accepting its political leadership.

relationships.target: 中国人民政治协商会议德宏傣族景颇族自治州委员会

relationships.source: 德宏傣族景颇族自治区首届各族各界人民代表协商委员会
relationships.target: 中国人民政治协商会议德宏傣族景颇族自治州委员会

description.zh-cn: 是德宏州政协的前身机构，于1956年5月正式改组成立为德宏州政协委员会。
description.en: It was the predecessor organization of the CPPCC Dehong Committee and was formally reorganized and established as the CPPCC Dehong Committee in May 1956.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国中央人民政府 (1949年—1954年)

description.zh-cn: 中央人民政府于1950年派出西南民族访问团到边疆地区进行慰问。
description.en: The Central People's Government dispatched the Southwest Nationalities Visiting Delegation in 1950 to visit the border regions.

relationships.target: 保山专区各族各界人民代表会议协商委员会

description.zh-cn: 为欢迎西南民族访问团，保山专区召开各民族代表会议，并在此基础上成立了协商委员会。
description.en: To welcome the Southwest Nationalities Visiting Delegation, Baoshan Prefecture convened a representative conference of all ethnic groups, which led to the establishment of the consultative committee.

relationships.source: 中国人民政治协商会议共同纲领
relationships.target: 保山专区各族各界人民代表会议协商委员会

description.zh-cn: 1950年12月保山专区召开的第一次各民族代表会议讨论了《中国人民政治协商会议共同纲领》规定的民族政策，并在此基础上成立了协商委员会。
description.en: The first representative conference of all ethnic groups held in Baoshan Prefecture in December 1950 discussed the ethnic policies stipulated in the Common Program of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference, which led to the establishment of the consultative committee.

relationships.target: 保山专区各族各界人民代表会议协商委员会

保山专区各族各界人民代表会议协商委员会
中国人民政治协商会议德宏傣族景颇族自治州委员会

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命爆发后，德宏州政协受到冲击停止工作，直至1983年4月才恢复工作。
description.en: After the outbreak of the Cultural Revolution, the CPPCC Dehong Committee was impacted and ceased its work until it was restored in April 1983.
